name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant spot for modern Mexican cuisine with a focus on tacos and craft tequila, often hosting live music on weekends.

name: Druthers Brewing Company
description: A popular brewpub offering hearty pub fare and house-brewed beers, with a lively atmosphere and frequent events.

name: Taqueria Tren Maya
description: A hidden gem for authentic tacos and Yucatan-inspired dishes, celebrated for its bold flavors and affordability.

name: New World Bistro Bar
description: An eclectic eatery with a globally inspired menu, featuring unique fusions and a commitment to local ingredients.

name: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
description: A trendy spot in downtown Albany with elevated pub fare and a reputation for hosting live music events.

name: El Mariachi Mexican Restaurant
description: A colorful spot for classic Mexican fare, especially known for its tacos and festive atmosphere.

name: Jack's Oyster House
description: An iconic Albany restaurant since 1913, specializing in fresh seafood and classic steakhouse fare.

name: The Olde English Pub
description: A charming pub with British-inspired fare and a cozy atmosphere, often featuring live music.

name: Bombers Burrito Bar
description: A quirky, local favorite for massive burritos and tacos, with a fun, laid-back vibe.

name: Lark Street Tavern
description: A historic tavern with hearty pub food and a rotating selection of craft beers, often hosting live music.

name: Yono's
description: A fine dining destination offering a unique blend of Indonesian and contemporary cuisine, a standout in Albany.

name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que
description: A regionally iconic spot for smoked meats and Southern sides, with a lively atmosphere and frequent live music.

name: Tara Kitchen
description: A cozy spot for authentic Moroccan tagines and couscous, offering a unique cultural dining experience.

name: Brown's Brewing Co.
description: A brewery and restaurant with hearty pub fare and house-made beers, often hosting live music and events.

name: Oaxaquena Triqui
description: A small, authentic Oaxacan eatery specializing in tlayudas and moles, a must-try for taco enthusiasts.
